message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $95 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, taking into account the high worth of the product to you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the exceptional benefits of our product at a fantastic price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase.
